description:
Unofficial app for German site golem.de with videos, dark mode and additional fe
The unofficial app for the German news site golem.de makes reading the current articles comfortable.
It is optimized for all screen sizes, has functions like dark mode, deeplinks and offline articles (for premium user). And if a feature is missing, it can be implemented or requested easily due to its open source development.

Information for permissions:
* Network: Requirement to communicate with Golem.de
